Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT "A" PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.65 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING AND REPAIRING ROADS AND BRIDGES THROUGHOUT THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District "A" of Webster Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of two and sixty-five hundredths (2.65) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $247,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and repairing roads and bridges throughout the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist.No.3 -- 15 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 3 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 15 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT IN AND FOR THE DISTRICT, INCLUDING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 3 of the Parish of Webster, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of fifteen (15) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $84,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Heflin Fire Prot.District -- 15 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
HEFLIN FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 15 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING OR OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT OF HEFLIN FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Heflin Fire Protection District of the Parish of Webster, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of fifteen (15) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $57,330 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating fire protection facilities and equipment of the District?
